category.template: Kindly raise a stationary request on myRequests-https://myrequests.accenture.com/ WKPLC1

You have two very simple way to get answer to your Transport Query 1.Just dial 66666 from Accenture Landline number and select option 1. Or 2.Visit your TMS login - https://india.etransport.accenture.com/TmsReport/TMSHome.aspx WKPLC2

Now you can book conference on the go. Download Reserve mobile app from Accenture App catalog. Or to Reserve Space and book online login to - https://reservations.accenture.com/reserve-space/ or Drop an email to India.Conferences@accenture.com
WKPLC3
